mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER(MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_PWD, MEMBER_NM, MEMBER_PHONE, MEMBER_EMAIL, MEMBER_ADDR, MEMBER_INTEREST) VALUES(SEQ_MNO.NEXTVAL, #{memberId}, #{memberPwd}, #{memberName}, #{memberPhone}, #{memberEmail}, #{memberAddress}, #{memberInterest})
